title: A high-performance liquid chromatography method validation and a Box–Behnken experimental design for the extraction optimization of quercitrin from Nectandra reticulata
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,21874-21886
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01723D, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Juanita Pulido Teuta, Carlos-Eduardo Narváez-Cuenca, Mónica Ávila Murillo
The lower the content of ethanol in the extraction mixture and the higher the temperature, the higher the extraction of quercitrin.
